resources.string: What apps would you like to install to start with?
Just the essentials, with browser and base utilities.
All apps available on Maron OS store.
You need a passphrase to encrypt your files. You will be prompted for your passphrase every time you turn on your computer.
Make sure you save your passphrase.
If you have lose your passphrase, you will lose all of your data.
Fast, free and full of new features.
The latest version makes computing easier than ever.
Whether you\'re a developer, creator, gamer or administrator, you\'ll find new tools to improve your productivity and enhance your experience in this release.
